00020 #ifndef TOSTRING_H
00021 #define TOSTRING_H
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 #include <vector>
00026 #include <set>
00027 #include <list>
00028 #include <ostream>
00029 #include <sstream>
00030 
00031 template<typename T>
00032 std::string
00033 to_string(T t)
00034 {
00035   std::ostringstream streamOut;
00036   streamOut << t;
00037   return streamOut.str();
00038 }
00039 
00040 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00041 std::string
00042 to_string(T1 t1, T2 t2)
00043 {
00044   std::ostringstream streamOut;
00045   streamOut << t1 << " " << t2;
00046   return streamOut.str();
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<typename T, typename U>
00050 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const std::pair<T,U>& p)
00051 { return o << "(" << p.first << "," << p.second << ")"; }
00052 
00053 template<typename T>
00054 void output_container(std::ostream& o, const T& t)
00055 {
00056   o << "[";
00057   if(!t.empty())
00058   {
00059     typename T::const_iterator it(t.begin());
00060     o << *it;
00061     ++it;
00062     for(; it != t.end(); ++it)
00063       o << " , " << *it; 
00064   }
00065   o << "]";
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 template<typename T>
00070 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const std::vector<T>& t)
00071 {
00072   output_container(o, t);
00073   return o;
00074 }
00075 
00076 template<typename T>
00077 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const std::list<T>& t)
00078 {
00079   output_container(o, t);
00080   return o;
00081 }
00082 
00083 template<typename T>
00084 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const std::set<T>& t)
00085 {
00086   output_container(o, t);
00087   return o;
00088 }
00089 
00090 template<typename T>
00091 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const std::multiset<T>& t)
00092 {
00093   output_container(o, t);
00094   return o;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif
